mapper.select: select r.memberreview_num, r.party_num, r.user_num, r.writer_num, r.content, r.wdate, r.rated, m.num, m.nick_name as writer_name, mm.nick_name as user_name from memberreview r join member m on r.writer_num = m.num join member mm on r.user_num = mm.num where r.user_num = #{user_num} order by r.memberreview_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into memberreview(memberreview_num, party_num, user_num, writer_num, content, rated) values(mre_sequence.nextval, #{party_num}, #{user_num}, #{writer_num}, #{content}, #{rated})
mapper.update: update memberreview set content=#{content}, rated=#{rated}, wdate=sysdate where memberreview_num=#{memberreview_num}
